See weather in multiple cities.

1. search for city > 
    -present & future weather shown & [open weather API]
    -added to search history [local storage]

2.can view city name, date, icon of weather, temp,humidity, wind speed, and UV index.

3. UV index has color indicator of condition

4.view 5 day Forecast can view same as #2

5. click on search history can view current & future conditions
